text: Babagirira ubugugu maze bagerwaho n’ubwoba (bw’intambara) ukabona bakureba bakanaguzwa amaso nk’umuntu urimo gusamba; ariko iyo ubwoba bushize, babasesereza bakoresheje indimi zabo zityaye, bagira ubugugu bwo gukora ibyiza. Abo ntibigeze bemera, bityo ibikorwa byabo Allah yabigize imfabusa. Kandi ibyo kuri Allah biroroshye
